item.description:
it's the Moto Market's 11th Anniversary Party and Open House. 10:00-3:00. Refreshments, door prizes, specials.

We will meet at the Marriott and head on out to Acton at 12:15, we could leave earlier but I wanted to give people time to enjoy their Saturday morning and eat some lunch before the ride.

After some time at the market we will head off in directions unknown.

Be there or be square!

P.S. I'm sorry but I need to limit this ride to only 20 persons, hurry and sign up before it's full!
item.why: The Moto Market in Acton is a great 'bat cave' of sorts for all motorized 2 wheeled riders, they sell lots of accessories and gear and serve great coffee.
item.name: Moto Market in Acton *Open House*
